meanings.definition: The edible nut of a tropical American evergreen tree.
meanings.sent1: I love snacking on cashews during my break.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bag of cashews to add to her salad.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was caught red-handed hoarding cashews in its nest.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like cashews in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of roasted cashews filled the room, making everyone hungry.

meanings.sent1: The cashews tree in the backyard provides shade during hot days.
meanings.sent2: Farmers take good care of their cashews trees to ensure a good harvest.
meanings.sent3: The cashews tree waved its branches as if greeting the passing birds.
meanings.sent4: The cashews tree stood tall and proud, bearing fruits for all to enjoy.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the cashews tree rustled in the gentle breeze, creating a soothing sound.
